Trading Post
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Farm and Monster Rancher Cards: Trading Post
This area is for posting want/have lists in order to trade cards with other members.
Be warned, you are posting at your own risk!
MRM does not guarantee or warranty any transactions that occur as a result of posts here.


How it works:

1) Post your want/have list noting what your trade terms are.

2) Interested parties should post stating their interest in items to reserve them.

3) Transaction details should take place via email, or IM, or anyplace but here.
Do not post personal info like addresses or phone numbers here!

4) Post if you are finished, so a Moderator can delete the thread.

  • My trade list (MR CCG Artbox) April 6 - 04:12 pm
